globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; connect-src 'self' https://ag-monetix-staging.azure-api.net https://monetix-staging.azure-api.net; upgrade-insecure-requests;
globalHeaders.Permissions-Policy: camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=(), payment=(), usb=(), gyroscope=(), magnetometer=()
